flawed_nl_solution:
Their 1st child was born 15 years ago, and therefore is <<15=51>>51 years old.
Their 2nd child was born 1 year after their 51-year-old child, and therefore is 51-1=<<51-1=50>>50 years old.
Their 3rd child was born 4 years after their 50-year-old child, and therefore is 50-4=46 years old.
Their 4th child was born 2 years after their 46-year-old child, and therefore is 46-2=44 years old.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
